page.title: 09TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content: A traffic survey was undertaken on Wednesday 19th, Tuesday 25th June and Thursday 4th July 1985 to compare numbers of vehicles using the A20 and M20 in our block. The times chosen were 1040-1140 hours,0840-0940 hours and 1405-1505 hours respectively.Tuesday was chosen because it is market day in Ashford and the figures reflect an increase for this reason and because the time coincides with the rush hour for commuters to Ashford to work. Interesting facts brought out by the survey were:- a)cars form the bulk of vehicles. b)the big increase in vehicles to Ashford market. c)the small number of coaches during the holiday season. d)the number of ambulances from the hospital. e)the farm products carried on tractors
